page.title: 13PENISTONE CINEMA.
page.content:
Penistone cinema is situated on Shrewsbury Road in part of Penistone Town Hall. The cinema is divided into the circle and the stalls. the prices are as follows: STALLS ADULTS Â£1.20p CHILDREN Â£0.80p OAP Â£0.80p
CIRCLE ADULTS Â£1.50p CHILDREN Â£1.50p OAP Â£1.50p
At each interval two ladies bring out ice creams and drinks for sale. You can also get sweets at the box office. On average there is about 25-30 people each night although for family type films there is a much better attendance.
